Package org.anyframe.util.scripts

Provides utilities for shell script execution.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
DefaultScriptExecutor.ShellScriptCallback<T> shell script Callback interface. when executing shell script, implement individual main logic to doInProcessShell.
ScriptExecutor define the function to be executed with Shell Script.
 

Class Summary
DefaultScriptExecutor default implementation of ScriptExecutor which defines the function to be executed by Shell Script. default implementation was written by Unix command execution.
LinuxScriptExecutor as a ScirptExecutor implementation on Linux platform, extends DefaultScriptExecutor, default Unix implementation.
MacOsXScriptExecutor as a ScirptExecutor implementation on Mac OS x platform, extends DefaultScriptExecutor, default Unix implementation.
PlatformChooser automatically search shell script execution handling module by platform implementing ScriptExecutor according to OsType.
WindowsScriptExecutor as a ScirptExecutor implementation on Windows platform, extends DefaultScriptExecutor, default Unix implementation.
 

Enum Summary
OsType Hierarchical structures with Java Enums - http://blog.cedarsoft.com/2010/10/hierarchical-structures-with-java-enums/
 

Package org.anyframe.util.scripts Description

Provides utilities for shell script execution.

Since:
1.0.0
